paper_title.ja: パラレルメカニズムを用いた曲げ加工機による管材の三次元加工
paper_title.en: Three-Dimensional Tube Forming Processes with a New Hydraulic Bending Machine Using Parallel Kinematics

description.ja: This research presents three-dimensional (3D) tube forming processes using a new hydraulic bending machine. The proposed bending machine uses a new method. When tube is fed into the fixed and active dies, it is bent by shifting the relative position of the active die. The bending shapes are controlled by the relative distance and orientation between the mobile die and the fixed die, and the length of the fed tube. The active die movement is controlled by six-degrees-of-freedom parallel kinematics with a hydraulic servo drive. This forming process has a big advantage. The change of the expected bending shape will require no change in the tooling system, but only a new control program for the motion of the active die and the length of the fed tube. Practical applications show that the bending machine can be applied to universal designed products with a 3D profile. Based on these bending processes, we also proposed a procedure to determine the controlling parameters of 3D tube forming processes. Experimental results show that the controlling parameters can be applied to square pipes with a helix shape. Until now this spiral process has been difficult to achieve using a conventional bending machine.
description.en: This research presents three-dimensional (3D) tube forming processes using a new hydraulic bending machine. The proposed bending machine uses a new method. When tube is fed into the fixed and active dies, it is bent by shifting the relative position of the active die. The bending shapes are controlled by the relative distance and orientation between the mobile die and the fixed die, and the length of the fed tube. The active die movement is controlled by six-degrees-of-freedom parallel kinematics with a hydraulic servo drive. This forming process has a big advantage. The change of the expected bending shape will require no change in the tooling system, but only a new control program for the motion of the active die and the length of the fed tube. Practical applications show that the bending machine can be applied to universal designed products with a 3D profile. Based on these bending processes, we also proposed a procedure to determine the controlling parameters of 3D tube forming processes. Experimental results show that the controlling parameters can be applied to square pipes with a helix shape. Until now this spiral process has been difficult to achieve using a conventional bending machine.

research_project_title.ja: 材料試験技術の高度化に関する研究

description.ja: 負荷方向により機械的性質が全く異なる新素材に対応した、多軸制御による六軸の位置・力制御が可能な汎用自動材料試験システムの実現のための基礎実験を行うものであり、複合材料や樹脂材料などの新素材に対応した新しい多軸材料試験システムを確立し、より実用条件に近い材料評価方法の確立を目指す．

research_project_title.en: A Multi-Axial Materials Testing System Using6-DOF Parallel Kinematics

description.en: The proposed system consists of a testing machine, a measuring instrument and a controller. The testing machine is driven by a parallel kinematics (PKM) structure. Making use of the PKM serves not only to achieve complete motions along six axis but also to obtain high dynamical performance. The geometrical relationships of the PKM are derived. We show that the positions of moving platform can be represented as the length of the six limbs of the PKM. The hybrid position/force control scheme derived from a velocity based force control algorithm is introduced, so that we can use velocity-controlled DC servo motors for the PKM. Based on this control scheme, we also propose a method to multi-axial materials testing. The system can be applied to testing on advanced composite materials and components that are difficult to evaluate using conventional testing machines.

research_project_title.ja: 三次元塑性加工システムの開発

description.ja: パラレルメカニズム技術の特長を生かし、簡単な操作でねじり形を含む多彩な三次元曲げ加工が可能な、汎用NC加工システム（アルミ、鋼、SUS、マグネシウム管材、円管:Φ～20mmおよび異形管:□～20mm、繰り返し曲げ精度±0.05mm）の実現を目指す．

research_project_title.en: Development of a New Versatile Tube Bending Machine Using 6-DOF Parallel Kinematics

description.en: The proposed machine uses a new method. When tubes are fed into the fixed and mobile dies, they are bent by shifting the relative position of the mobile die. The bending radius is controlled by the relative distance and orientation between the mobile die and the tube. The bending angle is controlled by the length of fed tube. The positions and orientations of the mobile die are controlled by a 6-DOF parallel kinematics mechanism (PKM). Making use of the PKM serves not only to achieve a complete motion along six axes and to manufacture at high productivity, but also to obtain a high dynamic motion of the bending machine. Experimental results show that the bending machine can be applied to square pipes with a spiral shape that are difficult to bend using a conventional bending machine.

research_project_title.ja: パラレルメカニズムの技術を用いた３次元曲げ加工機

system_name.ja: 新規産業創造型提案公募制度

description.ja: 様々な断面形状を持った管材を，任意の３次元形状に曲げる加工法は，未だ確立されておらず，加工機も十分な性能を持つものが存在していない．また，加工精度のばらつきも大きいという問題がある．パラレルメカニズムの技術を用いることにより，シンプルな構造でありながら，任意の3次元形状に加工が行えるという特徴を持つ加工機を開発し，民間企業への技術移転，事業化を目指す．

research_project_title.ja: 多自由度ステージ機構の開発研究

description.ja: 従来の３自由度（X-Y-Z）ステージ機構と同等以下の大きさ、価格で、多軸微細作業ステージ（X、Y、Z、PTCH、ROLL、YAW）を実現することを目標とし、パラレルメカニズムを用いた小型６自由度ステージのプロトタイプを製作し、デジタルマイクロスコープを用いた観察実験による評価を行い、実用上非常に有望であることを確認した．
